alert.note: Alert for Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 2:46PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Wood County through 330 PM CDT... At 246 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Babcock, or 10 miles southwest of Wisconsin Rapids, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wisconsin Rapids and Pittsville around 300 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Milladore, Sherry, Auburndale, Walker, Dexterville, Hewitt, Blenker, Arpin, Powers Bluff County Park and Nekoosa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
